text: Every time you go through the drive through they say pull up in front of the doors or go park but if you park away from the doors you walk and get your own pizza. The pizza is moderate you get what you pay for a lot of dough light sauce bare toppings unless you pay extra.... not as bad as new haven

text: Location is a little sketch, but I love my Detroit-style pizza. Don't get the hot and ready pizzas; you gotta get the deep dish with a side of Italian cheese bread 😋

text: We went to the drive through and 2 cars were ahead of us. It took almost 8 minutes waiting to be served and we were so frustrated that we had to leave the drive through and walk in the store in order to be served.

text: I called it in and they told me 10 min I got there 15 min after my call. I get to the store and they did not even started making it. Then I  waited in the store for 20 min. I did not get a sorry from any one. …More
